column5: Our freshly remodelled lake cottage has a farmhouse chic decor, complete with a concrete farmhouse sink. All new flooring, nice linens and comfortable furnishings. Come relax right on beautiful Possum Kingdom Lake. We are located on the west side of PK, about 15 miles south of Graham, TX. We have kayaks and paddle boards available for rent with the property (inquiry directly regarding fees).
column8: Farmhouse Chic on Possum Kingdom Lake
